thread.title: Janet
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Janet

author: Janet
title: Janet
text: I highly recommend Home Zone Furniture Store. This is our second time to purchase furniture there and we are extremely pleased with our purchases. The man that waited on us was highly knowledgeable and friendly but not pushy. The store was well stocked with lots of selections in many price ranges. We will continue shopping there.
